mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte de la Virginie et du Maryland / Dressée sur la grande carte angloise de Mrs. Josué Fry et Pierre Jefferson, par le Sr. Robert de Vaugondy, géographe ordinaire du roi. ; Avec privilege 1755. ; Gravé E. Haussard
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Robert de Vaugondy, Gilles, 1688-1766
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Second state, without "Limites du Lord Fairfax" and a north-south Pennsylvania boundary.
Shows Virginia, Maryland, and "De La War counties."
The second state is described in Joshua Fry's The Fry & Jefferson map of Virginia and Maryland; a facsimile of the 1st ed. ... introduction by Dumas Malone. 1966.
From an edition of Robert de Vaugondy's Atlas Universel, with plate number "105" on verso.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Paul Mellon bequest, May 12, 2000.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mellon, Paul--Library--Personal copy
